Queries.AddDailySavingInfo: INSERT INTO ct_db.dailysaving (DS_ID, DS_Date, DS_FPAmount, DS_SPAmount, DS_TPAmount, NotTaken, DS_Data, DS_InBankDate, DS_Insrt_Person) VALUES (@DS_ID, @DS_Date, @DS_FPAmount, @DS_SPAmount, @DS_TPAmount, @NotTaken, @DS_Data, @DS_InBankDate, @DS_Insrt_Person);
Queries.UpdateDailySavingData: UPDATE ct_db.dailysaving SET DS_FPAmount = @DS_FPAmount, DS_SPAmount = @DS_SPAmount, DS_TPAmount = @DS_TPAmount, NotTaken = @NotTaken, DS_Updt_Person = @DS_Updt_Person WHERE DS_ID = @DS_ID;
Queries.DeleteDailySavingData: UPDATE ct_db.dailysaving SET DS_Data = @DS_Data, DS_InBankDate = @DS_InBankDate, DS_Del_Person = @DS_Del_Person WHERE DS_ID = @DS_ID;
